text: Anthodiscus is a genus of plant in family Caryocaraceae described as a genus in 1818.Meyer, Georg Friedrich Wilhelm. 1818. Primitiae florae essequeboensis adjectis descriptionibus centum circiter stirpium novarum, observationibusque criticis 193–194 in LatinTropicos, Anthodiscus G. Mey. The entire genus is endemic to South America.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesPrance, G. T. & M. F. da Silva. 1973. Caryocaraceae. Flora Neotropica, Monograph 12: 1–77.Forzza, R. C. 2010. Lista de espécies Flora do Brasil . Jardim Botânico do Rio de Janeiro, Rio de JaneiroPrance, G. T. 1987. An update on the taxonomy and distribution of the Caryocaraceae.
